creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: green 3/4"-1" wide woven and embroidered bands with red and black lines, divided by 3/8" tan woven strips; 2-1/2"-3-1/4" warp fringe, both ends; fringe is knotted at very end
dimension: 30 1/2 x 9 1/4 in. (77.47 x 23.5 cm) (length including fringe)
title: Head Scarf
